TenantSecurityPolicy.name: TenantSecurityPolicy
TenantSecurityPolicy.description: Stores security policies created and deployed in Security Center. For more information, see Define and Deploy Security Policies.

ApiName.description: The API name of the policy.

PolicyData.description: The policy details contained in JSON format.

PolicyIdentifier.description: The ID of this policy. Contains a unique virtual key from child to parent.

PolicyType.description: The type of policy. For example, Health Check Baseline.

SourceRowIdentifier.description: The ID of the policy that is applied to the tenant. This value is specific to the org that owns this record.

Status.description: The status of the policy. For example, the policy is active or inactive.
